book.synopsis: Hoping to reconcile with the mother of his child, reluctant contract killer John Rain inadvertently places them in the path of dangerous enemies and is forced to recruit the help of his nemesis from the Japanese FBI and an ex-marine sniper to preserve all of their lives. By the author of Killing Rain. 50,000 first printing.
book.dimensions: Height: 9.28 Inches, Length: 6.3 Inches, Weight: 1.3 Pounds, Width: 1.23 Inches
